source_sentence: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百二
三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯
translation: Translated by imperial order by Xuanzang, the Tripiṭaka Master

source_sentence: 初分菩薩住品第四十八之二
translation: Chapter 48bis of the First Part of the Abode of the Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩欲得無上正等菩提，應自起無忘失法，亦勸他起無忘失法，恒正稱揚起無忘失法法，歡喜讚歎起無忘失法者；應自起恒住捨性，亦勸他起恒住捨性，恒正稱揚起恒住捨性法，歡喜讚歎起恒住捨性者。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva wants to attain unsurpassed correct enlightenment, he should arouse the state of no forgetfulness himself, encourage others to arouse the state of no forgetfulness, constantly and correctly praise the state of no forgetfulness, and rejoice and praise those who arouse the state of no forgetfulness; he should arouse the nature of constancy and equanimity himself, encourage others to arouse the nature of constancy and equanimity, constantly and correctly praise the state of constancy and equanimity, and rejoice and praise those who arouse the nature of constancy and equanimity.

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩欲得無上正等菩提，應自攝受圓滿壽量，亦勸他攝受圓滿壽量，恒正稱揚攝受圓滿壽量法，歡喜讚歎攝受圓滿壽量者。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva wants to attain unsurpassed correct enlightenment, he should gather a full life span for himself, encourage others to gather a full life span, always praise the Dharma of gathering a full life span, and rejoice and praise those who gather a full life span.

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩欲得無上正等菩提，應自轉法輪，亦勸他轉法輪，恒正稱揚轉法輪法，歡喜讚歎轉法輪者。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva wants to attain unsurpassed correct enlightenment, he should turn the Dharma wheel himself, encourage others to turn the Dharma wheel, always praise the teaching that turns the Dharma wheel, and rejoice and praise those who turn the Dharma wheel.

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩欲得無上正等菩提，應自攝護正法令住，亦勸他攝護正法令住，恒正稱揚攝護正法令住法，歡喜讚歎攝護正法令住者。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva wants to attain unsurpassed correct enlightenment, he should guard the abiding of right laws himself, encourage others to guard the abiding of right laws, consistently and correctly praise the Dharma that guards the abiding of right laws, and rejoice and praise those who guard the abiding of right laws.

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩欲得無上正等菩提，以無所得而為方便，應如是住。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva wants to attain unsurpassed correct enlightenment and uses the method of obtaining nothing as the basis, he or she should thus abide.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩應如是學甚深般若波羅蜜多方便善巧，若如是學乃能安住所安住法，若如是學、如是安住，則於色得無障礙，於受、想、行、識得無障礙；於眼處得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意處得無障礙；於色處得無障礙，於聲、香、味、觸、法處得無障礙；於眼界得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意界得無障礙；於色界得無障礙，於聲、香、味、觸、法界得無障礙；於眼識界得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界得無障礙；於眼觸得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸得無障礙，於眼觸為緣所生諸受得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受得無障礙；於地界得無障礙，於水、火、風、空、識界得無障礙；於無明得無障礙，於行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死得無障礙；於離害生命得無障礙，於離不與取、欲邪行、虛誑語、麁惡語、離間語、雜穢語、貪欲、瞋恚、邪見得無障礙；於四靜慮得無障礙，於四無量、四無色定得無障礙；於布施波羅蜜多得無障礙，於淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多得無障礙；於內空得無障礙，於外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空得無障礙；於真如得無障礙，於法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界得無障礙；於四念住得無障礙，於四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支得無障礙；於苦聖諦得無障礙，於集、滅、道聖諦得無障礙；於八解脫得無障礙，於八勝處、九次第定、十遍處得無障礙；於空解脫門得無障礙，於無相、無願解脫門得無障礙；於極喜地得無障礙，於離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地得無障礙；於五眼得無障礙，於六神通得無障礙；於三摩地門得無障礙，於陀羅尼門得無障礙；於佛十力得無障礙，於四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法得無障礙；於順逆觀十二支緣起得無障礙；於知苦、斷集、證滅、修道得無障礙；於預流果得無障礙，於一來、不還、阿羅漢果得無障礙；於獨覺菩提得無障礙；於入菩薩正性離生位得無障礙；於嚴淨佛土得無障礙，於成熟有情得無障礙；於起菩薩神通得無障礙；於一切智得無障礙，於道相智、一切相智得無障礙；於斷一切煩惱相續習氣得無障礙；於無忘失法得無障礙，於恒住捨性得無障礙；於圓滿壽量得無障礙，於轉法輪得無障礙，於正法住得無障礙。
translation: 菩薩摩訶薩應如是學甚深般若波羅蜜多方便善巧，若如是學乃能安住所安住法，若如是學、如是安住，則於色得無障礙，於受、想、行、識得無障礙；於眼處得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意處得無障礙；於色處得無障礙，於聲、香、味、觸、法處得無障礙；於眼界得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意界得無障礙；於色界得無障礙，於聲、香、味、觸、法界得無障礙；於眼識界得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界得無障礙；於眼觸得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸得無障礙，於眼觸為緣所生諸受得無障礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受得無障礙；於地界得無障礙，於水、火、風、空、識界得無障礙；於無明得無障礙，於行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死得無障礙；於離害生命得無障礙，於離不與取、欲邪行、虛誑語、麁惡語、離間語、雜穢語、貪欲、瞋恚、邪見得無障礙；於四靜慮得無障礙，於四無量、四無色定得無障礙；於布施波羅蜜多得無障礙，於淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多得無障礙；於內空得無障礙，於外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空得無障礙；於真如得無障礙，於法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界得無障礙；於四念住得無障礙，於四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支得無障礙；於苦聖諦得無障礙，於集、滅、道聖諦得無障礙；於八解脫得無障礙，於八勝處、九次第定、十遍處得無障礙；於空解脫門得無障礙，於無相、無願解脫門得無障礙；於極喜地得無障礙，於離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地得無障礙；於五眼得無障礙，於六神通得無障礙；於三摩地門得無障礙，於陀羅尼門得無障礙；於佛十力得無障礙，於四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法得無障礙；於順逆觀十二支緣起得無障礙；於知苦、斷集、證滅、修道得無障礙；於預流果得無障礙，於一來、不還、阿羅漢果得無障礙；於獨覺菩提得無障礙；於入菩薩正性離生位得無障礙；於嚴淨佛土得無障礙，於成熟有情得無障礙；於起菩薩神通得無障礙；於一切智得無障礙，於道相智、一切相智得無障礙；於斷一切煩惱相續習氣得無障礙；於無忘失法得無障礙，於恒住捨性得無障礙；於圓滿壽量得無障礙，於轉法輪得無障礙，於正法住得無障礙。

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩從前際來不攝受色，不攝受受、想、行、識；不攝受眼處，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意處；不攝受色處，不攝受聲、香、味、觸、法處；不攝受眼界，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意界；不攝受色界，不攝受聲、香、味、觸、法界；不攝受眼識界，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界；不攝受眼觸，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸；不攝受眼觸為緣所生諸受，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受；不攝受地界，不攝受水、火、風、空、識界；不攝受無明，不攝受行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死；不攝受離害生命，不攝受離不與取、欲邪行、虛誑語、麁惡語、離間語、雜穢語、貪欲、瞋恚、邪見；不攝受四靜慮，不攝受四無量、四無色定；不攝受布施波羅蜜多，不攝受淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；不攝受內空，不攝受外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；不攝受真如，不攝受法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；不攝受四念住，不攝受四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；不攝受苦聖諦，不攝受集、滅、道聖諦；不攝受八解脫，不攝受八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；不攝受空解脫門，不攝受無相、無願解脫門；不攝受極喜地，不攝受離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地；不攝受五眼，不攝受六神通；不攝受三摩地門，不攝受陀羅尼門；不攝受佛十力，不攝受四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；不攝受十二支緣起順逆觀；不攝受知苦、斷集、證滅、修道；不攝受預流果，不攝受一來、不還、阿羅漢果；不攝受獨覺菩提；不攝受入菩薩正性離生位；不攝受嚴淨佛土，不攝受成熟有情；不攝受菩薩神通；不攝受一切智，不攝受道相智、一切相智；不攝受斷一切煩惱相續習氣；不攝受無忘失法，不攝受恒住捨性；不攝受圓滿壽量，不攝受轉法輪，不攝受正法住。
translation: 是菩薩摩訶薩從前際來不攝受色，不攝受受、想、行、識；不攝受眼處，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意處；不攝受色處，不攝受聲、香、味、觸、法處；不攝受眼界，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意界；不攝受色界，不攝受聲、香、味、觸、法界；不攝受眼識界，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界；不攝受眼觸，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸；不攝受眼觸為緣所生諸受，不攝受耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受；不攝受地界，不攝受水、火、風、空、識界；不攝受無明，不攝受行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死；不攝受離害生命，不攝受離不與取、欲邪行、虛誑語、麁惡語、離間語、雜穢語、貪欲、瞋恚、邪見；不攝受四靜慮，不攝受四無量、四無色定；不攝受布施波羅蜜多，不攝受淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；不攝受內空，不攝受外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；不攝受真如，不攝受法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；不攝受四念住，不攝受四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；不攝受苦聖諦，不攝受集、滅、道聖諦；不攝受八解脫，不攝受八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；不攝受空解脫門，不攝受無相、無願解脫門；不攝受極喜地，不攝受離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地；不攝受五眼，不攝受六神通；不攝受三摩地門，不攝受陀羅尼門；不攝受佛十力，不攝受四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；不攝受十二支緣起順逆觀；不攝受知苦、斷集、證滅、修道；不攝受預流果，不攝受一來、不還、阿羅漢果；不攝受獨覺菩提；不攝受入菩薩正性離生位；不攝受嚴淨佛土，不攝受成熟有情；不攝受菩薩神通；不攝受一切智，不攝受道相智、一切相智；不攝受斷一切煩惱相續習氣；不攝受無忘失法，不攝受恒住捨性；不攝受圓滿壽量，不攝受轉法輪，不攝受正法住。

source_sentence: 色不可攝受故，若色不可攝受則非色；受、想、行、識不可攝受故，若受、想、行、識不可攝受則非受、想、行、識。
translation: It's because form can't be taken in, and if form can't be taken in, then it's not form; it's because feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness can't be taken in, and if feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness can't be taken in, then it's not feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness.

source_sentence: 眼處不可攝受故，若眼處不可攝受則非眼處；耳、鼻、舌、身、意處不可攝受故，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意處不可攝受則非耳、鼻、舌、身、意處。
translation: It's because the sense-field of the eye can't be taken in, and if the sense-field of the eye can't be taken in, then it's not the sense-field of the eye; it's because the sense-fields of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind can't be taken in, and if the sense-fields of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind can't be taken in, then it's not the sense-fields of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

source_sentence: 色處不可攝受故，若色處不可攝受則非色處；聲、香、味、觸、法處不可攝受故，若聲、香、味、觸、法處不可攝受則非聲、香、味、觸、法處。
translation: It's because the form realm can't be taken in, and if the form realm can't be taken in, then it isn't the form realm; it's because the sense, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms can't be taken in, and if the sense, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms can't be taken in, then they aren't sense, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms.

source_sentence: 眼界不可攝受故，若眼界不可攝受則非眼界；耳、鼻、舌、身、意界不可攝受故，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意界不可攝受則非耳、鼻、舌、身、意界。
translation: It's because the eye realm can't be taken in, and if the eye realm can't be taken in, then it's not the eye realm; it's because the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms can't be taken in, and if the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms can't be taken in, then they're not the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms.

source_sentence: 色界不可攝受故，若色界不可攝受則非色界；聲、香、味、觸、法界不可攝受故，若聲、香、味、觸、法界不可攝受則非聲、香、味、觸、法界。
translation: It's because the form realm can't be taken in, and if the form realm can't be taken in, then it's not the form realm; it's because the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms can't be taken in, and if the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms can't be taken in, then it's not the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms.

source_sentence: 眼識界不可攝受故，若眼識界不可攝受則非眼識界；耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界不可攝受故，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界不可攝受則非耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界。
translation: It's because the element of the visual consciousness can't be taken in, and if the element of the visual consciousness can't be taken in, then it's not the element of the visual consciousness; it's because the ear, nose, tongue, body, and consciousness element can't be taken in, and if the ear, nose, tongue, body, and consciousness element can't be taken in, then it's not the ear, nose, tongue, body, or consciousness element.

source_sentence: 眼觸不可攝受故，若眼觸不可攝受則非眼觸；耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸不可攝受故，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸不可攝受則非耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸。
translation: It's because eye contact can't be taken in, and if eye contact can't be taken in, then it's not eye contact; it's because ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact can't be taken in, and if ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact can't be taken in, then it's not ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind contact.

source_sentence: 眼觸為緣所生諸受不可攝受故，若眼觸為緣所生諸受不可攝受則非眼觸為緣所生諸受；耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受不可攝受故，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受不可攝受則非耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受。
translation: It's because the sensations that arise from visual contact as a condition can't be taken in, and if the sensations that arise from visual contact as a condition can't be taken in, then they aren't the sensations that arise from visual contact as a condition; it's because the sensations that arise from ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact as a condition can't be taken in, and if the sensations that arise from ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact as a condition can't be taken in, then they aren't the sensations that arise from ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact as a condition.

source_sentence: 地界不可攝受故，若地界不可攝受則非地界；水、火、風、空、識界不可攝受故，若水、火、風、空、識界不可攝受則非水、火、風、空、識界。
translation: It's because the earth realm can't be taken in, and if the earth realm can't be taken in, then it isn't the earth realm; it's because the water, fire, wind, air, and consciousness realms can't be taken in, and if the water, fire, wind, air, and consciousness realms can't be taken in, then they aren't the water, fire, wind, air, and consciousness realms.

source_sentence: 無明不可攝受故，若無明不可攝受則非無明；行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死不可攝受故，若行乃至老死不可攝受則非行乃至老死。
translation: It's because nescience can't be collected, and if nescience can't be collected, then it isn't nescience; it's because form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, birth, and old age can't be collected, and if form and even old age can't be collected, then it isn't form and even old age.

source_sentence: 離害生命不可攝受故，若離害生命不可攝受則非離害生命；離不與取、欲邪行不可攝受故，若離不與取、欲邪行不可攝受則非離不與取、欲邪行。
translation: It's because life free of harm can't be taken in, and if life free of harm can't be taken in, then it's not life free of harm; it's because freedom from taking and desire for wrong actions can't be taken in, and if freedom from taking and desire for wrong actions can't be taken in, then it's not freedom from taking and desire for wrong actions.

source_sentence: 離虛誑語不可攝受故，若離虛誑語不可攝受則非離虛誑語；離麁惡語、離間語、雜穢語不可攝受故，若離麁惡語、離間語、雜穢語不可攝受則非離麁惡語、離間語、雜穢語。
translation: It's because words free of falsity can't be taken in, and if words free of falsity can't be taken in, then they aren't free of falsity; it's because words free of crude speech, words free of interruption, and words of defilement can't be taken in, and if words free of crude speech, words free of interruption, and words of defilement can't be taken in, then they aren't free of crude speech, words free of interruption, and words of defilement.

source_sentence: 離貪欲不可攝受故，若離貪欲不可攝受則非離貪欲；離瞋恚、邪見不可攝受故，若離瞋恚、邪見不可攝受則非離瞋恚、邪見。
translation: It's because freedom from desire can't be taken in, and if freedom from desire can't be taken in, then it's not freedom from desire; it's because freedom from anger and wrong views can't be taken in, and if freedom from anger and wrong views can't be taken in, then it's not freedom from anger and wrong views.

source_sentence: 初靜慮不可攝受故，若初靜慮不可攝受則非初靜慮；第二、第三、第四靜慮不可攝受故，若第二、第三、第四靜慮不可攝受則非第二、第三、第四靜慮。
translation: It's because the first concentration can't be taken in, and if the first concentration can't be taken in, then it's not the first concentration; it's because the second, third, and fourth concentrations can't be taken in, and if the second, third, and fourth concentrations can't be taken in, then it's not the second, third, or fourth concentration.

source_sentence: 慈無量不可攝受故，若慈無量不可攝受則非慈無量；悲、喜、捨無量不可攝受故，若悲、喜、捨無量不可攝受則非悲、喜、捨無量。
translation: It's because kindness is immeasurable and can't be taken in, and if kindness is immeasurable and can't be taken in, then it isn't kindness that's immeasurable; it's because pity, joy, and equanimity are immeasurable and can't be taken in, and if pity, joy, and equanimity are immeasurable, then they aren't pity, joy, and equanimity that are immeasurable.

source_sentence: 空無邊處不可攝受故，若空無邊處不可攝受則非空無邊處；識無邊處、無所有處、非想非非想處不可攝受故，若識無邊處、無所有處、非想非非想處不可攝受則非識無邊處、無所有處、非想非非想處。
translation: It's because the infinity of emptiness can't be taken in, and if the infinity of emptiness can't be taken in, then it's not the infinity of emptiness; it's because the infinity of consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception can't be taken in, and if the infinity of consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception can't be taken in, then it's not the infinity of consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

source_sentence: 布施波羅蜜多不可攝受故，若布施波羅蜜多不可攝受則非布施波羅蜜多；淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多不可攝受故，若淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多不可攝受則非淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多。
translation: It's because the perfection of generosity can't be taken in, and if the perfection of generosity can't be taken in, then it isn't the perfection of generosity; it's because the perfection of pure precepts, patience, effort, meditation, and prajñāpāramitā can't be taken in, and if the perfection of pure precepts, patience, effort, meditation, and prajñāpāramitā can't be taken in, then it isn't the perfection of pure precepts, patience, effort, meditation, and prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 內空不可攝受故，若內空不可攝受則非內空；外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空不可攝受故，若外空乃至無性自性空不可攝受則非外空乃至無性自性空。
translation: It's because internal emptiness can't be taken in, and if internal emptiness can't be taken in, then it's not internal emptiness; external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, existent emptiness, impermanent emptiness, dispersed emptiness, immutable emptiness, intrinsic emptiness, emptiness in own-nature, emptiness in own-form, emptiness in common form, emptiness of all things, unobtainable emptiness, emptiness without nature, emptiness in own-nature, and emptiness in own-nature without nature can't be taken in, and if external emptiness or even emptiness in own-nature without nature can't be taken in, then it's not external emptiness or emptiness in own-nature without nature.

source_sentence: 真如不可攝受故，若真如不可攝受則非真如；法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界不可攝受故，若法界乃至不思議界不可攝受則非法界乃至不思議界。
translation: It's because true thusness can't be taken in and because if true thusness can't be taken in, then it isn't true; it's because the Dharma realm, Dharma nature, non-falsity, unchanging nature, equality, freedom from birth, legality, Dharma abiding, reality, the space realm, and the inconceivable realm can't be taken in and because if the Dharma realm and even the inconceivable realm can't be taken in, then the untruth and even the inconceivable realm can't be taken in.

source_sentence: 四念住不可攝受故，若四念住不可攝受則非四念住；四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支不可攝受故，若四正斷乃至八聖道支不可攝受則非四正斷乃至八聖道支。
translation: It's because the four abodes of mindfulness can't be taken in, and if the four abodes of mindfulness can't be taken in, then they aren't the four abodes of mindfulness; it's because the fourfold elimination, the four miraculous powers, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and the eight noble factors of the path can't be taken in, and if the fourfold elimination and even the eight noble factors of the path can't be taken in, then they aren't the fourfold elimination and even the eight noble factors of the path.

source_sentence: 苦聖諦不可攝受故，若苦聖諦不可攝受則非苦聖諦；集、滅、道聖諦不可攝受故，若集、滅、道聖諦不可攝受則非集、滅、道聖諦。
translation: It's because the noble truth of suffering can't be taken in, and if the noble truth of suffering can't be taken in, then it's not the noble truth of suffering; it's because the noble truths of arising, ceasing, and the path can't be taken in, and if the noble truths of arising, ceasing, and the path can't be taken in, then they're not the noble truths of arising, ceasing, and the path.

source_sentence: 八解脫不可攝受故，若八解脫不可攝受則非八解脫；八勝處、九次第定、十遍處不可攝受故，若八勝處、九次第定、十遍處不可攝受則非八勝處、九次第定、十遍處。
translation: It's because the eight liberations can't be taken in, and if the eight liberations can't be taken in, then they aren't the eight liberations; it's because the eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes can't be taken in, and if the eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes can't be taken in, then they aren't the eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes.

source_sentence: 空解脫門不可攝受故，若空解脫門不可攝受則非空解脫門；無相、無願解脫門不可攝受故，若無相、無願解脫門不可攝受則非無相、無願解脫門。
translation: It's because the liberation gate of emptiness can't be taken in, and if the liberation gate of emptiness can't be taken in, then it's not the liberation gate of emptiness; it's because the liberation gate of signlessness and wishlessness can't be taken in, and if the liberation gate of signlessness and wishlessness can't be taken in, then it's not the liberation gate of signlessness and wishlessness.

source_sentence: 極喜地不可攝受故，若極喜地不可攝受則非極喜地；離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地不可攝受故，若離垢地乃至法雲地不可攝受則非離垢地乃至法雲地。
translation: It's because the ground of ultimate joy can't be taken in, and if the ground of ultimate joy can't be taken in, then it's not the ground of ultimate joy; it's because the ground of separation from defilement, the ground of emission of light, the ground of burning wisdom, the ground of extreme difficulty, the ground of direct presence, the ground of distant practice, the ground of immovability, the ground of good wisdom, and the ground of the dharma-cloud can't be taken in, and if the ground of separation from defilement and even the ground of the dharma-cloud can't be taken in, then it's not the ground of separation from defilement and even the ground of the dharma-cloud.

source_sentence: 五眼不可攝受故，若五眼不可攝受則非五眼；六神通不可攝受故，若六神通不可攝受則非六神通。
translation: It's because the five eyes can't be collected, and if the five eyes can't be collected, then it's not the five eyes; it's because the six supernormal powers can't be collected, and if the six supernormal powers can't be collected, then it's not the six supernormal powers.

source_sentence: 三摩地門不可攝受故，若三摩地門不可攝受則非三摩地門；陀羅尼門不可攝受故，若陀羅尼門不可攝受則非陀羅尼門。
translation: It's because the approach of samādhi can't be taken in, and if the approach of samādhi can't be taken in, then it's not the approach of samādhi; it's because the approach of dhāraṇī can't be taken in, and if the approach of dhāraṇī can't be taken in, then it's not the approach of dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 佛十力不可攝受故，若佛十力不可攝受則非佛十力；四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法不可攝受故，若四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法不可攝受則非四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法。
translation: It's because the Buddha's ten powers can't be taken in, and if the Buddha's ten powers can't be taken in, then they aren't the Buddha's ten powers; it's because the four fearlessnesses, the four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the 18 Buddha-uncommon dharmas can't be taken in, and if the four fearlessnesses and the 18 Buddha-uncommon dharmas can't be taken in, then they aren't the four fearlessnesses and the 18 Buddha-uncommon dharmas.

source_sentence: 十二緣起順逆觀不可攝受故，若十二緣起順逆觀不可攝受則非十二緣起順逆觀。
translation: It's because the contemplation of twelve links of dependent arising and adversity can't be taken in, and if the contemplation of twelve links of dependent arising and adversity can't be taken in, then it's not the contemplation of twelve links of dependent arising and adversity.

source_sentence: 知苦、斷集、證滅、修道不可攝受故，若知苦、斷集、證滅、修道不可攝受則非知苦、斷集、證滅、修道。
translation: It's because knowing suffering, ending accumulation, realizing cessation, and cultivating cannot be taken in, and if knowing suffering, ending accumulation, realizing cessation, and cultivating cannot be taken in, then it's not knowing suffering, ending accumulation, realizing cessation, or cultivating.

source_sentence: 預流果不可攝受故，若預流果不可攝受則非預流果；一來、不還、阿羅漢果不可攝受故，若一來、不還、阿羅漢果不可攝受則非一來、不還、阿羅漢果。
translation: It's because the fruit of stream-winner can't be taken in, and if the fruit of stream-winner can't be taken in, then it's not a fruit of stream-winner; it's because the fruit of once-returning, irreversibility, and arhatship can't be taken in, and if the fruit of once-returning, irreversibility, and arhatship can't be taken in, then it's not the fruit of once-returning, irreversibility, and arhatship.

source_sentence: 獨覺菩提不可攝受故，若獨覺菩提不可攝受則非獨覺菩提。
translation: It's because the enlightenment of the pratyekabuddhas can't be taken in, and if the enlightenment of the pratyekabuddhas can't be taken in, then it's not the enlightenment of the pratyekabuddhas.

source_sentence: 入菩薩正性離生位不可攝受故，若入菩薩正性離生位不可攝受則非入菩薩正性離生位。
translation: It's because entering the bodhisattva's correct nature and the stage of separation from birth can't be taken in, and if entering the bodhisattva's correct nature and the stage of separation from birth can't be taken in, then it's not entering the bodhisattva's correct nature and the stage of separation from birth.

source_sentence: 嚴淨佛土不可攝受故，若嚴淨佛土不可攝受則非嚴淨佛土。
translation: It's because the glorious and pure Buddha-lands can't be taken in, and if the glorious and pure Buddha-lands can't be taken in, then they aren't the glorious and pure Buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 成熟有情不可攝受故，若成熟有情不可攝受則非成熟有情。
translation: Mature sentient beings can't be collected, and if mature sentient beings can't be collected, then they aren't mature sentient beings.

source_sentence: 菩薩神通不可攝受故，若菩薩神通不可攝受則非菩薩神通。
translation: It's because the bodhisattva's supernormal abilities can't be collected, and if the bodhisattva's supernormal abilities can't be collected, then they aren't bodhisattva supernormal abilities.

source_sentence: 一切智不可攝受故，若一切智不可攝受則非一切智；道相智、一切相智不可攝受故，若道相智、一切相智不可攝受則非道相智、一切相智。
translation: It's because omniscience can't be taken in, and if omniscience can't be taken in, then it's not omniscience; it's because knowledge of the path and knowledge of all characteristics can't be taken in, and if knowledge of the path and knowledge of all characteristics can't be taken in, then it's not knowledge of the path and knowledge of all characteristics.

source_sentence: 斷一切煩惱相續習氣不可攝受故，若斷一切煩惱相續習氣不可攝受則非斷一切煩惱相續習氣。
translation: It's because the habituated tendencies that are continuous in nature and eliminate all afflictions can't be collected, and if the habituated tendencies that are continuous in nature and eliminate all afflictions can't be collected, then it's not because the habituated tendencies that are continuous in nature and eliminate all afflictions.

source_sentence: 無忘失法不可攝受故，若無忘失法不可攝受則非無忘失法；恒住捨性不可攝受故，若恒住捨性不可攝受則非恒住捨性。
translation: It's because the absence of forgetfulness can't be taken in, and if the absence of forgetfulness can't be taken in, then it isn't absence of forgetfulness; it's because the nature of constancy and equanimity can't be taken in, and if the nature of constancy and equanimity can't be taken in, then it isn't constancy and equanimity.

source_sentence: 圓滿壽量不可攝受故，若圓滿壽量不可攝受則非圓滿壽量。
translation: A full lifespan can't be taken in, and if a full lifespan can't be taken in, then it's not a full lifespan.

source_sentence: 轉法輪不可攝受故，若轉法輪不可攝受則非轉法輪。
translation: It's because the turning of the wheel of the Dharma can't be taken in, and if the turning of the wheel of the Dharma can't be taken in, then it's not the turning of the wheel of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 正法住不可攝受故，若正法住不可攝受則非正法住。」
translation: It's because the abode of the right Dharma can't be taken in, and if the abode of the right Dharma can't be taken in, then it's not the abode of the right Dharma."

source_sentence: 說是菩薩住品時，萬二千菩薩摩訶薩得無生法忍。
translation: When this chapter of the abode of the bodhisattvas was taught, twelve thousand bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas attained the forbearance of the nonarising of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 初分不退轉品第四十九之一
translation: Chapter 49-1 of the First Part of the Nonretrogression [Chapter 4]

source_sentence: 爾時，具壽善現白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, Kauśāmbī said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 不退轉菩薩摩訶薩有何行、有何狀、有何相？
translation: What are the nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva's practices, what are his appearances, and what are his characteristics?

source_sentence: 我等云何知是不退轉菩薩摩訶薩？」
translation: How do we know this is the nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva?"

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩能如實知諸異生地、諸聲聞地、諸獨覺地、諸菩薩地、諸如來地，如是諸地於諸法真如中無變異、無分別，皆無二無二分，是菩薩摩訶薩雖如實悟入諸法真如，而於諸法真如無所分別，以無所得為方便故。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva can truly know that the stages of unenlightened sentient beings, stages of direct disciples, stages of solitary realizers, stages of bodhisattvas, and stages of tathāgatas are unchanging, undiscriminated, and without duality or distinction in the true nature of things, then even though the bodhisattva-mahāsattva has truly realized the true nature of things, he has no discrimination between the true nature of things because he has obtained nothing as a method.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩既如實悟入諸法真如已，雖聞真如與一切法無二無別而無疑滯。
translation: After truly awakening to the true nature of dharmas, the bodhisattva Mahāsattva hears that the true nature and all dharmas are not two or different but isn't hindered by doubt.

source_sentence: 真如與一切法不可說一異、俱不俱故。
translation: "The true thusness and all dharmas can't be said to be the same or different, and neither is the same.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩終不輕爾而發語言，所發語言皆引義利，若無義利終不發言。
translation: That bodhisattva-mahāsattva never speaks rashly, and whatever words he speaks are always for the benefit of the cause, and he never speaks if there's no benefit.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩不觀視他好惡長短，平等憐愍而為說法。
translation: That bodhisattva, Mahāsattva, doesn't judge the goodness or badness of others, and he teaches with equal compassion.

source_sentence: 不退轉菩薩摩訶薩有如是等諸行、狀、相，應以如是諸行、狀、相，知是不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。」
translation: The nonretrogressing bodhisattva Mahāsattva has such-and-such conduct, appearance, and characteristics, and you should know that this is the nonretrogressing bodhisattva Mahāsattva based on such-and-such conduct, appearance, and characteristics."

source_sentence: 具壽善現復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Guoshou Shancheng then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 復以何行、何狀、何相，知是不退轉菩薩摩訶薩？」
translation: Furthermore, by what practice, by what appearance, and by what marks does one know that he is a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva?"

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩能觀一切法無行、無狀、無相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。」
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva can observe that all things lack form, shape, and characteristics, you should know that this is a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva."

source_sentence: 具壽善現復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Guoshou Shancheng then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若一切法無行、無狀、無相，是菩薩摩訶薩於何法退轉故名不退轉？」
translation: If all things lack practice, lack form, and lack characteristics, what is it that the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress from and therefore are called nonretrogressing?"

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於色退轉故名不退轉，於受、想、行、識退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress in form, and nonretrogression because they regress in feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness.

source_sentence: 色自性無所有，受、想、行、識自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The own-nature of form has no existence, and the own-natures of feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness also have no existence; this is called the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's turning back because he doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於眼處退轉故名不退轉，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意處退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva backslides in the eye, and it's called nonretrogression because he backslides in the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

source_sentence: 眼處自性無所有，耳、鼻、舌、身、意處自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the sense-field of the eye has nothing, and the self-natures of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind have nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於色處退轉故名不退轉，於聲、香、味、觸、法處退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva regresses in the place of form, and it's called nonretrogression because he regresses in the place of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma.

source_sentence: 色處自性無所有，聲、香、味、觸、法處自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the form realm is nonexistent, and the self-natures of the sense, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms are also nonexistent, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas don't stop there.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於眼界退轉故名不退轉，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意界退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva-mahāsattva backslides in the element of vision, and nonretrogression because he backslides in the elements of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

source_sentence: 眼界自性無所有故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意界自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: Because the self-nature of the visual realm has nothing, the self-natures of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mental realms also have nothing, and this is called the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's turning back because he doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於色界退轉故名不退轉，於聲、香、味、觸、法界退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas regress in the form realm and nonretrogression because they regress in the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms.

source_sentence: 色界自性無所有，聲、香、味、觸、法界自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the form realm is nonexistent, and the self-natures of the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms are also nonexistent, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於眼識界退轉故名不退轉，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva regresses in the element of the visual consciousness and nonretrogression because he regresses in the elements of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and consciousness.

source_sentence: 眼識界自性無所有，耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the visual consciousness realm is nonexistent, and the self-natures of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and consciousness realms are also nonexistent, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't stop there.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於眼觸退轉故名不退轉，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva backs away from contact with the eyes, and it's called nonretrogression because he backs away from contact with his ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

source_sentence: 眼觸自性無所有，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of visual contact is nonexistent, and the self-natures of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mental contact are also nonexistent.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於眼觸為緣所生諸受退轉故名不退轉，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受退轉故名不退轉。
translation: "It's called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas regress from the sensations that arise from visual contact, and it's called nonretrogression because they regress from the sensations that arise from contact with the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

source_sentence: 眼觸為緣所生諸受自性無所有，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of feelings that arise from visual contact as a condition is nonexistent, and the self-nature of feelings that arise from ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact as a condition is also nonexistent, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於地界退轉故名不退轉，於水、火、風、空、識界退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress in the element of earth, and nonretrogression because they regress in the elements of water, fire, wind, air, and consciousness.

source_sentence: 地界自性無所有，水、火、風、空、識界自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the earth realm is nonexistent, and the self-natures of the water, fire, wind, air, and consciousness realms are also nonexistent.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於無明退轉故名不退轉，於行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress from ignorance, and nonretrogression because they regress from volition, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, apprehension, existence, birth, and old age and death.

source_sentence: 無明自性無所有，行乃至老死自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The own-nature of nescience has nothing, and the own-natures of formations and even old age and death have nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas don't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於布施波羅蜜多退轉故名不退轉，於淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas often regress from the perfection of generosity, and nonretrogression because they often regress from the perfections of pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and wisdom.

source_sentence: 布施波羅蜜多自性無所有，淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The own-nature of the perfection of generosity is nonexistent, and the own-natures of the perfections of pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and wisdom are also nonexistent, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't abide in them.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於內空退轉故名不退轉，於外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattvas regress from internal emptiness and nonretrogression from external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, infinite emptiness, dispersed emptiness, unchanging emptiness, emptiness of original nature, emptiness of own characteristics, emptiness of shared characteristics, emptiness of all things, inaccessible emptiness, emptiness without nature, emptiness of self-nature, and emptiness of self-nature without nature.

source_sentence: 內空自性無所有，外空乃至無性自性空自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of internal emptiness has nothing, and the self-nature of external emptiness or even the self-nature of the natureless self-nature has nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於真如退轉故名不退轉，於法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress from the true thusness, and nonretrogression from the reality realm, reality nature, not-falsely nature, unchanging and dissimilar nature, equality nature, freedom from birth, legality, Dharma abiding, actuality, space realm, and inconceivable realm.

source_sentence: 真如自性無所有，法界乃至不思議界自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the true nature has nothing, and the self-nature of the Dharma realm and even the inconceivable realm have nothing, so this is called the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's turning back because he doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於四念住退轉故名不退轉，於四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva-mahāsattva backslides from the four abodes of mindfulness and nonretrogression because he backslides from the four correct eliminations, four miraculous abilities, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and eight factors of the noble path.

source_sentence: 四念住自性無所有，四正斷乃至八聖道支自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The own-nature of the four abodes of mindfulness has nothing, and the own-natures of the four correct eliminations and even the eight noble factors of the path have nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, don't abide in them.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於苦聖諦退轉故名不退轉，於集、滅、道聖諦退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas regress in the noble truth of suffering and nonretrogression in the noble truths of accumulation, cessation, and the path.

source_sentence: 苦聖諦自性無所有，集、滅、道聖諦自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the noble truth of suffering has no existence, and the self-natures of the noble truths of arising, cessation, and the path have no existence, so the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't abide in them and therefore is called turning back.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於四靜慮退轉故名不退轉，於四無量、四無色定退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress from the four meditations, and nonretrogression because they regress from the four immeasurable and four formless concentrations.

source_sentence: 四靜慮自性無所有，四無量、四無色定自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the four meditations is devoid of existence, and the self-natures of the four immeasurable and four formless concentrations are devoid of existence, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas don't abide in them.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於八解脫退轉故名不退轉，於八勝處、九次第定、十遍處退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress from the eight liberations, and nonretrogression because they regress from the eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes.

source_sentence: 八解脫自性無所有，八勝處、九次第定、十遍處自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The own-nature of the eight liberations is nonexistent, and the own-natures of the eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes are also nonexistent, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas don't abide in them.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於空解脫門退轉故名不退轉，於無相、無願解脫門退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress at the gate of the liberation of emptiness, and nonretrogression because they regress at the gate of the liberation of signlessness and wishlessness.

source_sentence: 空解脫門自性無所有，無相、無願解脫門自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The liberation gate of emptiness has no essence, and the liberation gate of signlessness and wishlessness also has no essence, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas don't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於五眼退轉故名不退轉，於六神通退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva has regressed from the five eyes and nonretrogression because he has regressed from the six supernormal powers.

source_sentence: 五眼自性無所有，六神通自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the five eyes has nothing, and the self-natures of the six psychic powers have nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, don't abide in them.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於三摩地門退轉故名不退轉，於陀羅尼門退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress at the approach of samādhi, and nonretrogression because they regress at the approach of the dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 三摩地門自性無所有，陀羅尼門自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the approach of samādhi has nothing, and the self-nature of the approach of dhāraṇī has nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas don't dwell in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於佛十力退轉故名不退轉，於四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva backslides from the Buddha's ten powers, and it's called nonretrogression because he backslides from the four fearlessnesses, the four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the 18 uncommon dharmas of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 佛十力自性無所有，四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the Buddha's ten powers has nothing, and the self-natures of the four unsurpassables and even the 18 Buddha-principles have nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, don't abide in them.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於預流果退轉故名不退轉，於一來、不還、阿羅漢果退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress from the fruit of stream-winner, and nonretrogression because they regress from the fruit of once-returner, nonreturner, and arhat.

source_sentence: 預流果自性無所有，一來、不還、阿羅漢果自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The own-nature of the fruit of pre-flow has nothing, and the own-natures of the first-returner, nonreturner, and arhat fruits also have nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and arhats don't abide in them.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於獨覺菩提退轉故名不退轉。
translation: Because this bodhisattva Mahāsattva has regressed from the enlightenment of the solitary realizer, he's called nonretrogressing.

source_sentence: 獨覺菩提自性無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of pratyekabuddha's enlightenment is nonexistent, and this is called retrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於一切智退轉故名不退轉，於道相智、一切相智退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, regress from omniscience, and nonretrogression because they regress from knowledge of the path and omniscience.

source_sentence: 一切智自性無所有，道相智、一切相智自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of omniscience has no existence, and the self-natures of cognition of the path and cognition of all characteristics have no existence, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas don't abide in it.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於異生地退轉故名不退轉，於聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and tathāgatas regress in the land of the unenlightened ones, and nonretrogression because they regress in the land of the śrāvakas, solitary realizers, bodhisattvas, and tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 異生地自性無所有，聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地自性亦無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the stage of unenlightened sentient beings has nothing, and the self-natures of the stages of śrāvakas, solitary realizers, bodhisattvas, and tathāgatas also have nothing, which is called retrogression because the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas don't stop there.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提退轉故名不退轉。
translation: This is called nonretrogression because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva has retrogressed from the unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 阿耨多羅三藐三菩提自性無所有，是菩薩摩訶薩於中不住故名退轉。
translation: The self-nature of the unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment is nonexistent, and this is called the bodhisattva's turning back because he doesn't abide in it.

source_sentence: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩終不樂觀外道沙門、婆羅門等形相言說，彼諸沙門、婆羅門等於所知法實知實見，或能施設正見法門必無是處。
translation: If the nonretrogressing bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas are never optimistic about the forms and characteristics of non-Buddhist ascetics and priests, there's no place for those ascetics and priests to truly know and see what they know or to define the teaching of right view.

source_sentence: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: If someone has accomplished such actions, forms, and characteristics, they should be known as a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩於佛善說法毘奈耶，深生信解終無疑惑，無戒禁取不墮惡見，不執世俗諸吉祥事以為清淨，終不禮敬諸餘天神，如諸世間外道所事，亦終不以種種華鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、伎樂、燈明供養天神及諸外道。
translation: If a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva gives rise to deep faith in the Buddha's skillful teaching on vinaya, never has any doubts, doesn't observe the precepts and prohibitions, doesn't fall into bad views, doesn't hold to worldly and auspicious things as pure, never venerates other gods like those served by worldly heretics, and never makes offerings to gods and heretics with various kinds of flower garlands, scattered incense, clothing, jewelry, banners, banners, music, and lamps.

source_sentence: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: If someone has accomplished such actions, forms, and characteristics, they should be known as a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，不生地獄、傍生、鬼界、阿素洛中，亦不生於卑賤種族，謂旃荼羅、補羯娑等，亦終不受扇[打-丁+虎]、半擇、無形、二形及女人身，亦復不受盲聾、瘖瘂、攣躄、癲癎、矬陋等身，亦終不生無暇時處。
translation: "If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva in the stage of nonretrogression isn't born in hell, the animals, the realm of ghosts, or asuras, or among the inferior races, such as the caṇḍalas and the pukkas, he'll never be subject to the fan [tada-din+hu], half-verified, shapeless, two-figured, or womanly bodies, nor will he be subject to the bodies of the deaf and blind, the dumb, the convulsive, the crippled, and the ugly, nor will he ever be born in a place without leisure time.

source_sentence: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: If someone has accomplished such actions, forms, and characteristics, they should be known as a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩常樂受行十善業道，自離害生命，亦勸他離害生命，恒正稱揚離害生命法，歡喜讚歎離害生命者；自離不與取，亦勸他離不與取，恒正稱揚離不與取法，歡喜讚歎離不與取者；自離欲邪行，亦勸他離欲邪行，恒正稱揚離欲邪行法，歡喜讚歎離欲邪行者；自離虛誑語，亦勸他離虛誑語，恒正稱揚離虛誑語法，歡喜讚歎離虛誑語者；自離麁惡語，亦勸他離麁惡語，恒正稱揚離麁惡語法，歡喜讚歎離麁惡語者；自離離間語，亦勸他離離間語，恒正稱揚離離間語法，歡喜讚歎離離間語者；自離雜穢語，亦勸他離雜穢語，恒正稱揚離雜穢語法，歡喜讚歎離雜穢語者；自離貪欲，亦勸他離貪欲，恒正稱揚離貪欲法，歡喜讚歎離貪欲者；自離瞋恚，亦勸他離瞋恚，恒正稱揚離瞋恚法，歡喜讚歎離瞋恚者；自離邪見，亦勸他離邪見，恒正稱揚離邪見法，歡喜讚歎離邪見者。
translation: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩常樂受行十善業道，自離害生命，亦勸他離害生命，恒正稱揚離害生命法，歡喜讚歎離害生命者；自離不與取，亦勸他離不與取，恒正稱揚離不與取法，歡喜讚歎離不與取者；自離欲邪行，亦勸他離欲邪行，恒正稱揚離欲邪行法，歡喜讚歎離欲邪行者；自離虛誑語，亦勸他離虛誑語，恒正稱揚離虛誑語法，歡喜讚歎離虛誑語者；自離麁惡語，亦勸他離麁惡語，恒正稱揚離麁惡語法，歡喜讚歎離麁惡語者；自離離間語，亦勸他離離間語，恒正稱揚離離間語法，歡喜讚歎離離間語者；自離雜穢語，亦勸他離雜穢語，恒正稱揚離雜穢語法，歡喜讚歎離雜穢語者；自離貪欲，亦勸他離貪欲，恒正稱揚離貪欲法，歡喜讚歎離貪欲者；自離瞋恚，亦勸他離瞋恚，恒正稱揚離瞋恚法，歡喜讚歎離瞋恚者；自離邪見，亦勸他離邪見，恒正稱揚離邪見法，歡喜讚歎離邪見者。

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩，乃至夢中亦不現起十惡業道，況在覺時！
translation: Such a bodhisattva-mahāsattva doesn't even give rise to the ten evil karmic destinies in a dream, so why wouldn't he do so when he's awake?

source_sentence: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: If someone has accomplished such actions, forms, and characteristics, they should be known as a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，普為饒益一切有情恒修布施波羅蜜多，普為饒益一切有情恒修淨戒波羅蜜多，普為饒益一切有情恒修安忍波羅蜜多，普為饒益一切有情恒修精進波羅蜜多，普為饒益一切有情恒修靜慮波羅蜜多，普為饒益一切有情恒修般若波羅蜜多。
translation: "If the nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva cultivates the perfection of generosity for the benefit of all sentient beings, the perfection of pure morality for the benefit of all sentient beings, the perfection of forbearance for the benefit of all sentient beings, the perfection of effort for the benefit of all sentient beings, the perfection of meditation for the benefit of all sentient beings, and the perfection of prajñā for the benefit of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: If someone has accomplished such actions, forms, and characteristics, they should be known as a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩諸所受持、思惟、讀誦、究竟通利清淨教法，所謂契經、應頌、記莂、諷頌、自說、緣起、本事、本生、方廣、希法、譬喻、論議，以如是法常樂布施一切有情，恒作是念：『云何當令諸有情類，求正法願皆得滿足？』
translation: If the nonretrogressing bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas retain, contemplate, recite, and thoroughly penetrate the pure teachings, which are called sūtras, verses, records, chants, self-explanations, dependent arising, abilities, births, vastness, rarefied dharmas, parables, and discussions, and always delight in bestowing these things on all sentient beings, they always think, 'How will I cause all sentient beings to fulfill their vow to seek the right teaching?'

source_sentence: 復持如是法施善根，與諸有情同共迴向諸佛無上正等菩提。
translation: "Furthermore, by maintaining this good root of giving dharmas, they'll work together with sentient beings to return to the buddhas' unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: If someone has accomplished such actions, forms, and characteristics, they should be known as a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，於佛所說甚深法門，終不生於疑惑猶豫。」
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva in the stage of nonretrogression never has doubts or hesitations about the profound teaching taught by the Buddha, then..."

source_sentence: 時，具壽善現白佛言：「世尊！
translation: The life-size Good Samaritan then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 何緣不退轉菩薩摩訶薩，於佛所說甚深法門，終不生於疑惑猶豫？」
translation: What are the conditions for a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva to never become doubtful or hesitant about the profound teaching that the Buddha has taught?"

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩都不見有法可疑惑猶豫，謂不見有色，亦不見有受、想、行、識，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼處，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有色處，亦不見有聲、香、味、觸、法處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼界，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有色界，亦不見有聲、香、味、觸、法界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼識界，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼觸，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼觸為緣所生諸受，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有地界，亦不見有水、火、風、空、識界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有無明，亦不見有行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有布施波羅蜜多，亦不見有淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有內空，亦不見有外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有真如，亦不見有法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有四念住，亦不見有四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有苦聖諦，亦不見有集、滅、道聖諦，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有四靜慮，亦不見有四無量、四無色定，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有八解脫，亦不見有八勝處、九次第定、十遍處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有五眼，亦不見有六神通，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有三摩地門，亦不見有陀羅尼門，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有佛十力，亦不見有四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有預流果，亦不見有一來、不還、阿羅漢果，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有獨覺菩提，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有一切智，亦不見有道相智、一切相智，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有異生地，亦不見有聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，可於中生疑惑猶豫。
translation: 是菩薩摩訶薩都不見有法可疑惑猶豫，謂不見有色，亦不見有受、想、行、識，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼處，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有色處，亦不見有聲、香、味、觸、法處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼界，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有色界，亦不見有聲、香、味、觸、法界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼識界，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼觸，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有眼觸為緣所生諸受，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有地界，亦不見有水、火、風、空、識界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有無明，亦不見有行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有布施波羅蜜多，亦不見有淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有內空，亦不見有外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有真如，亦不見有法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有四念住，亦不見有四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有苦聖諦，亦不見有集、滅、道聖諦，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有四靜慮，亦不見有四無量、四無色定，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有八解脫，亦不見有八勝處、九次第定、十遍處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有五眼，亦不見有六神通，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有三摩地門，亦不見有陀羅尼門，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有佛十力，亦不見有四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有預流果，亦不見有一來、不還、阿羅漢果，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有獨覺菩提，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有一切智，亦不見有道相智、一切相智，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有異生地，亦不見有聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地，可於中生疑惑猶豫；不見有阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，可於中生疑惑猶豫。

source_sentence: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: If he accomplishes such actions, forms, and characteristics, you should know that he's a nonretrogressing bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百二十五
